name: Reuben Pickle Sliders
author: Soup Loving Nicole
summary: Game day...check. Reubens...check. Happy guests...check! Don't expect these to hang around long.
ingredients: ½ cup chopped cooked corned beef
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil
Arrange bread pieces on the baking sheet
Toast in the preheated oven for 5 minutes
Transfer to a plate and keep oven on
Combine mayonnaise, ketchup, onion, and horseradish in a small bowl
Place 12 dill pickle slices on the foil-lined baking sheet
Evenly distribute corned beef over the pickle slices
Top each with a teaspoon of mayo mixture
Place a piece of toasted bread over the top of the mayo mixture
Top each with a piece of cheese
Bake in the preheated oven for 5 minutes
Remove from oven and top each slider with remaining pickle slices
Stick a toothpick in each slider to serve
